name: RAZED
description: Sprint through dynamic neon levels in the quickest time possible, employing skills such as super-speed boosts, mega-jumps, drifts, stomps and strafes to bypass obstacles and uncover shortcuts to propel yourself up the online leaderboards.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 (32-bit) 处理器: Dual Core 2.2 GHz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: Intel HD 3000 / GeForce 310m /Radeon HD 5450 存储空间: 需要 700 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 10 处理器: Intel Core I5-7400 3.00GHZ 内存: 16 GB RAM 图形: NVidia GeForce Gtx 1060 存储空间: 需要 700 MB 可用空间
